tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Farmers (
    farmer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farmer_name TEXT,
    pesticide_usage BOOLEAN,
    crop_rotations INT,
    organic_certifications BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Certifications (
    certification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farmer_id INT,
    certification_name VARCHAR(255),
    certification_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (farmer_id) REFERENCES Farmers(farmer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Pesticide_Usage (
    farmer_id INT,
    pesticide_name VARCHAR(255),
    application_date DATE,
    application_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    PRIMARY KEY (farmer_id, pesticide_name, application_date)
);

CREATE TABLE Crop_Rotations (
    farmer_id INT,
    crop_name VARCHAR(255),
    rotation_date DATE,
    previous_crop VARCHAR(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (farmer_id, crop_name, rotation_date)
);

CREATE TABLE Organic_Certifications (
    farmer_id INT,
    certification_name VARCHAR(255),
    certification_date DATE,
    certifying_organization VARCHAR(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (farmer_id, certification_name, certification_date)
);

CREATE TABLE Pesticide_Usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farmer_id INT,
    pesticide_name VARCHAR,
    usage_date DATE,
    quantity DECIMAL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_farmer_id FOREIGN KEY (farmer_id) REFERENCES Farmers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Crop_Rotations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farmer_id INT,
    crop_name VARCHAR,
    rotation_date DATE,
    previous_crop VARCHAR,
    CONSTRAINT fk_farmer_id FOREIGN KEY (farmer_id) REFERENCES Farmers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Organic_Certifications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farmer_id INT,
    certification_name VARCHAR,
    issue_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_farmer_id FOREIGN KEY (farmer_id) REFERENCES Farmers(id)
);
